In just 4 steps

Step

Download App from Google Play Store

Download the app from the Google Play Store and SignUp or Login to your account.

Step

Shop

Browse and shop for café treats, restaurant meals, electronics, fashion, and more, all in one convenient app, mirroring your favorite local or preferred stores.

Scan

Simply scan the shop's QR code via the app and complete your payment securely through online mode.

Step

Redeem

Maximize your savings by enjoying exclusive offers, discounts, vouchers, and loyalty rewards from businesses, while simultaneously boosting the coin value for the respective shop.
